forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 3C. WSW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning. Partly cloudy skies late. High 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 33F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 35F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
